content: संनद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Tied or bound together, girded or put on. {@--2@} Clad or dressed in armour, accoutred, mailed. {@--3@} Arranged, ready, or prepared, for battle, armed, fully equipped; नवजलधरः संनद्धोऽयं न दृप्तनिशाचरः <ls>V. 4. 1</ls>; कः संनद्धे विरहविधुरां त्वय्युपेक्षेत जायां <ls>Me. 8.</ls> {@--4@} Ready, prepared, formed, arranged in general; लतेव संनद्धमनोज्ञपल्लवा <ls>R. 3. 7.</ls> {@--5@} Pervading; कुसुममिव लोभनीयं यौवनमंगेषु संनद्धं <ls>Ś. 1. 21.</ls> {@--6@} Wellprovided with anything. {@--7@} Murderous. {@--8@} Closely attached, bordering, near. {@--9@} Ready to burst or blossom. {@--10@} Provided with charms.
